amendment.description: To deauthorize portions of the project for East Fork of Trinity River, Texas.

vote.text: Amendment SA 880 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 880 proposed by Senator Vitter for Senator Cornyn.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 880 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
